advisory.name: RLBA-2022:1995
advisory.synopsis: selinux-policy bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for selinux-policy is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description: For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.6 Release Notes linked from the References section.
